name: Rosary Of The Reaper
description:
Rosary Of The Reaper is an in-development RPG Maker, Dark Fantasy/Horror, anime-inspired project that is currently in demo phase.

The story follows the main protagonist, Kanna Izaki, an epileptic teenage pennsylvanian girl. Around Kanna's hometown of Mainville, there have been reports of random, sometimes gruesome deaths, including the abrupt passing of one of Kanna's classmates during class. This, coupled by strange dreams and forewarnings of the end of the world, make the days leading up to Kanna's 18th birthday nothing short of bizarre. However, on the day of Kanna's birthday, her life will be changed, forever.

This game contains gore and nudity, but no sexual content. Some content in this game is of a nature some players may find disturbing, and caution should be advised if you suffer from depression or similiar illnesses.
